org.dkpro.core.api.io.sequencegenerator

Class PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dkpro.core.api.io.sequencegenerator.PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    PhraseSequenceGenerator

    public static class PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder
extends Object
    Builder for PhraseSequenceGenerators.

    Alternative constructs a StringSequenceGenerator with buildStringSequenceGenerator()

    • Constructor Summary

      Generate a PhraseSequenceGenerator

      If set to true, the generated phrases contain characters instead of tokens or other annotations.

        Parameters:

      • minTokenLength

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder minTokenLength(int minTokenLength)
        Parameters:
        minTokenLength - tokens shorter than the given length are filtered out
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

      • filterRegex

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder filterRegex(String filterRegex)
        This method can be called multiple times in order to add multiple regular expressions for filtering. If a token matches any of the regular expression, it is omitted.
        Parameters:
        filterRegex - Tokens matching this regular expression are filtered out.
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

      • filterRegexReplacement

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder filterRegexReplacement(String filterRegexReplacement)
        Parameters:
        filterRegexReplacement - tokens matching the filterRegexes are replaced by this string. If this is empty, these tokens are removed.
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

      • lowercase

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder lowercase(boolean lowercase)
        Parameters:
        lowercase - If true, all tokens are lowercased
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

      • coveringType

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder coveringType(String coveringType)
        Parameters:
        coveringType - if set, a separate string sequence is generated for each sequence covered by the covering type, e.g. one sequence for each sentence.
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

      • characters

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder characters(boolean characters)
        If set to true, the generated phrases contain characters instead of tokens or other annotations.
        Parameters:
        characters - a boolean
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator.Builder

      • build

        public PhraseSequenceGenerator build()
                              throws IOException
        Generate a PhraseSequenceGenerator
        Returns:
        a PhraseSequenceGenerator instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if a stopwords file is specified but cannot be read

      • buildStringSequenceGenerator

        public StringSequenceGenerator buildStringSequenceGenerator()
                                                     throws IOException
        Generate a StringSequenceGenerator that directly returns Strings instead of LexicalPhrases.
        Returns:
        a StringSequenceGenerator instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if a stopwords file is specified but cannot be read
